title: Flux through one face of tetrahedron

content.prompt: A charge +q is placed at the center of a tetrahedron whose faces are all equilateral triangles, as shown above. What is the flux of the electric field through one face of the tetrahedron?

choices.label: q ϵ 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@476D@

q 4 ϵ 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@482B@
The flux through one face cannot be determined from the information given.

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
